name: Japanese Family Crests - 家紋
description:
This is a vector data of a traditional Japanese family crest.

It can be used to combine them to make an original family crest.


A family crest is a mark that represents the prestige and authority of a family. They were stamped on armor, swords, banners, and other items used by warriors in battles. It is said that there are more than 1,0000 types of family crests in existence today.


日本の伝統的な家紋のベクターデータです。

組み合わせてオリジナルの家紋を作ったりするのに利用できます。


家紋とは、家の格式や権威を表す印のことです。武士が合戦に使った甲冑や刀や幟などに刻印されていました。現在では10000種類以上存在すると言われています。
